Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.Server
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class Server extends Object implements Runnable
Server class that handles the connection with the clients.

      public Server(int rmiPort, int socketPort, String ipAddress)
      Constructor of the server
      Parameters:
      rmiPort - port for the rmi connection
      socketPort - port for the socket connection
      ipAddress - ip address of the server

    • getIpAddress

      public String getIpAddress()

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)

    • run

      public void run()
      Process that pings all the clients to check if they are still connected
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • getInstance

      public static Server getInstance() throws IOException
      This method is used to get the instance of the server if it is already started and to start it if it is not already started
      Returns:
      the instance of the server if it is already started, otherwise it starts the server and returns the instance of the server
      Throws:
      IOException - if the server is not started

    • loginToServer

      public void loginToServer(String nickname, Connection connection) throws Exception
      Method that handles the login of a player to the server into 2 cases: if the player is already known or not known by the server
      Parameters:
      nickname - of the player
      connection - of the player
      Throws:
      Exception - if the player is already connected or if the nickname is already used

    • onDisconnect

      public void onDisconnect(Connection playerConnection) throws IOException
      Method that handles the disconnection of a player from the server
      Parameters:
      playerConnection - of the player
      Throws:
      IOException - if the player is not connected to the server

    • receiveMessageFromClient

      public void receiveMessageFromClient(Message message) throws Exception
      Method that handles the message received from a client
      Parameters:
      message - received from the client
      Throws:
      Exception - if the message is not valid
